studio_texture.alt: Close up of audio mixing console in dark studio

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a premium, dark-mode worship resource platform. Avoid generic SaaS looks. Think 'Spotify meets High-End Architectural Studio'.
instructions_to_main_agent.theme_setup: Force dark mode by default in Tailwind config. Set background to #050505.
layout_rules: Use 'container mx-auto' but with 'max-w-7xl' for wider screens.
In the catalog, use a masonry or tight grid layout for song cards.
The Song Detail page should look like a digital liner note booklet - elegant, spacious, text-focused.
components: Customize Shadcn components to remove the default 'slate' look. Use the #121212 surface color.
Buttons should be pill-shaped (rounded-full) for a modern app feel.
Inputs should be flat with bottom borders or very subtle full borders.
universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients on text unless it's a very large h1.
Do NOT center everything. Use asymmetry for interest.
All interactive elements must have data-testid.
